type.name: involved_select
type.description: An involved_select is a thing that is involved in an activity.

description.p: An Individual involvement in activity specifies that a thing is involved in an individual activity.
An individual is involved in an activity if a segment in the life of the individual is part of the activity. Hence:

ul.li: an individual product is involved in an activity if it is created, used or changed by the activity;
an individual document is involved in an activity if it is created, modified or read by the activity;
an individual organization is involved in an activity if it plays a role in the activity;
an individual person is involved in an activity if he or she plays a role in the activity.

example.p: The involvment of John Doe, who is a stress engineer at Joe Bloggs and Co. in the stress analysis of part XYZ_123 carried out on 2001-05-02 is an individual_involvement_in_activity.
This individual involvement is classified as a member of the class_of_involvement_in_activity 'stress analysis performer'.

description.p: A class can also be involved in an individual_activity. In this case it is the class itself and not the members of the class that play a role.
description.note: This entity is identical to involvment in ISO 15926-2.
